Subdivision.SubDescription: Each home built by Charles Carpenter is built as if it were for himself. From the ground work to completion, he will be totally involved in the construction of your new home. He is a hands-on builder in the truest sense, overseeing every single item that will go into the home and ensuring that each subcontractor and supplier will provide exacting standards of craftsmanship and quality for all aspect of the construction process. He will choose only the latest and most durable products to ensure that your home will withstand the test of time while remaining beautiful and functioning to fit your needs. As your home is being built, rest assured that Charles is involved in every way. Each site is visited daily and all work must be approved by him before the next step can begin. This process ensures quality and durability, the key ingredients to a long lasting resilient home. Whether the style of your home is Mediterranean, Traditional, Country, or your very own idea, Charles Carpenter will create the elegance and functionality to shape your dream home. The reasons are clear; Charles Carpenter Homes is a superior choice if you are planning to build in the Brevard County area. With a significant investment such as your home, basing your decision on a builder with quality, craftsmanship and customer service, you can be confident that Charles Carpenter Homes will build you the home of you dreams.

Plan.Description: This Spanish design influenced home features a highly formed entryway into a beautifully laid out single level home. Exterior columns accent the façade and intricate details outline the interior on this most prestigious model.

A highly formed elevation achieves its genuine flavor with a well crafted display of masonry, clean lines, and plenty of windows. This single level home combines classic styling with livability for today. Step and coffered ceilings in combination with present day amenities make this the perfect place to call home. A large master suite, three guest suites and an attractive study masterfully laid out in this ideal floor plan make this home a family special.

Immense stone pilasters stand out above the paneled entryway which deciphers this European inspired design. Round clerestory windows and keystones set this unique facade apart from the rest. A high coffered ceiling with reaching windows enlightens the formal living room as the family room and kitchen invite relaxation and comfort. The upper level provides a large computer loft and guest suites.

Stacked stone accents this stunning European inspired elevation. Inside, pocket doors open up combining the living and leisure rooms with the open air of the wrapping lanai. The integrity of the design is further enhanced by coffered and stepped ceilings and slender vertical windows with transoms. The open kitchen and nook are ideal for informal gatherings while the living and dining room play host to the most sophisticated guest.

This unique home combines a triple-arched entry with columns and stucco along with corbel accents above. Inside the home feels elegant and inviting with corner-pocket doors that open up to the covered lanai allowing the rear of the home to become part of the living experience.

This distinctive Mediterranean estate home is nothing less then magnificent. The facade features decorative columns, a recessed entry and tall vertical windows with circular transoms. Inside, volume ceilings and walls of glass form an interior for the most affluent home owner.

Stacked stone accents this stunning European inspired elevation. Inside, pocket doors open up combining the living and leisure rooms with the open air of the wrapping lanai. The integrity of the design is further enhanced by coffered and stepped ceilings and slender vertical windows with transoms. The open kitchen and nook are ideal for informal gatherings while the living and dining room play host to the most sophisticated guest.

The deeply laid entry sits behind beautifully detailed stone columns as this Spanish influenced design combines circular windows and arched transoms to highlight this striking façade. Inside, the foyer, living room and dining area create a great room feel bordered by columns and three sets of French doors leading to the covered veranda. Upstairs, the loft's curved wrought iron railing leads to the great room below and the two guest suite's French doors open to an outdoor deck.
